model_answer: A: On the Grammys red carpet with the Grammy logo behind him, he’s called a favorite, discusses having six nominations, and is read a tweet about performing with a “swanky group of guys.”

The answer is B: Event 5: He says an “Ego sample” has no chance to be cleared, mentions a Coldplay sample as “possibly,” and brings up MGMT, with a dog audible in the background. This discussion directly sets up the talk of sample clearing that occurs later in the audio.
